mapper.select: SELECT L_LOGISTICS_MX.WLBH, L_LOGISTICS_MX.TMH, L_JYTMXX.BED_NO, L_JYTMXX.PATIENTNAME, L_JYTMXX.EXAMINAIM FROM L_LOGISTICS_MX, L_JYTMXX WHERE ( L_LOGISTICS_MX.DOCTADVISENO = L_JYTMXX.DOCTADVISENO ) and L_LOGISTICS_MX.wlbh = #{wlbh} order by L_JYTMXX.BED_NO
